means: 劝告，提建议( advise的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Doctors advised that he should be transferred to a private room.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生们建议将他转到单人病房。

sentence.Network_en: Many aspiring young artists are advised to learn by copying the masters.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多胸怀抱负的年轻画家被建议通过临摹大师的作品来学习绘画。

sentence.Network_en: Shelley was advised that the Italian climate would rejuvenate him.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人建议雪莱去意大利，那里的天气会使他恢复活力。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The doctor advised the patient not to smoke any more ., 医生奉劝病人不能再抽烟了.
when he lost his job , his parents advised him to keep a stiff upper lip ., 当他失业时 , 他父母劝他坚定沉著.
《Friends》词... ... auditioned n. 听, 听力, 试听 advised adj. 考虑过的, 细想过的 tricks n. 诡计, 骗局, 恶作剧, 窍门, 诀窍.

2012年职称英语词汇表最新完整版 - 豆丁网 ... advice n． 忠告，劝告 * advisable adj． 明智的，可取的 adviser n． 劝告者，顾问 *.
顾问案( Consultant )就像是企业的长驻法律顾问 , 我们的投管执行顾问( Advisor )会定期到公司召开投管会议 , 撰写公司投资策略及计.
艾米:不懂说将来(22) | 艾园 ... downtown: 市中心 advisor: 顾问，指导教授 mall: 购物中心.

means.word_mean: 考虑到的,讨论到的,经深思熟虑的
谨慎的,明智的,有道理的
通知过的;通晓的;受到启发的

entry.def: If you advise someone to do something, you tell them what you think they should do.

example.ex: The minister advised him to leave as soon as possible...
Herbert would surely advise her how to approach the bank...
example.tran: 赫伯特一定会就如何与银行接洽向她提供意见。

entry.def: If an expert advises people on a particular subject, he or she gives them help and information on that subject.

example.ex: ...an officer who advises undergraduates on money matters...
example.tran: 为本科生们提供理财建议的高级职员

example.ex: A family doctor will be able to advise on suitable birth control.
example.tran: 家庭医生能够就合适的节育措施提出建议。

entry.tran: 通知，告知（某人事实或情况）
entry.def: If you advise someone of a fact or situation, you tell them the fact or explain what the situation is.

example.ex: ...the decision requiring police to advise suspects of their rights...
example.tran: 要求警方告知疑犯他们所享权利的决定

example.ex: I think it best that I advise you of my decision to retire.
example.tran: 我想我最好告诉你我决定退役。

entry.def: If an official document states that you are advised to do something, it is telling you the correct or appropriate thing to do.

example.ex: Candidates in India are advised to submit their applications through the overseas student office in London...
example.tran: 印度的申请人被告知通过驻伦敦的海外学生办公室递交申请表。

example.ex: Residents are advised not to put their rubbish bags on the pavement outside their houses.
example.tran: 居民被告知不要将垃圾袋放在门外的人行道上。

means.word_mean: 1. having the benefit of careful prior consideration or counsel;

sentences.sentence: "a well-advised delay in carrying out the plan"

auth_sentence.content: My mum advised me to go to swimming-pood everyday.
auth_sentence.res_content: My mum advised me to go to swimming-pood everyday.

auth_sentence.res_content: Mr. Hwang advised his students to make flash cards.

Sentence.sentence: Donna helped the people of the village to organize an irrigation project, and she also advised them on planting corps that didn't require much water.
The ninth-grader is advised to go to his teacher or the principal to discuss his concerns.
